pkgmetadata.longdescription: Downloads and Parses Data from the Department of Federal Revenue in Brazil // Downloads and parses data from official site on Department of Federal Revenue in Brazil (Receita Federal do Brasil, RFB). Data are collected from RFB site (http://idg.receita.fazenda.gov.br). Latest update was in December 15, 2017. There are more than 9 million companies IDs and 17 million partner information.
